DOC.brief_summary: Rationale : Proteins release muscle shortly exercise , often refer myokines , may central understand cross-talk exercise skeletal muscle organ , particular liver . So far myokines identify ( e.g . IL-6 , IL-8 , IL-15 , TNF-alpha ) . Taking account role several know myokines develop insulin resistance , reveal new putative myokines might provide valuable information direction future research pathogenesis treatment type 2 diabetes mellitus . Objective : The objective present study identify novel myokines , expression alter skeletal muscle single bout exercise . Study design : experimental study . Study population : Ten healthy , male subject 40 60 year age BMI < 30 kg/m2 , participate study . Intervention : A single exercise bout consist one hour one-legged cycling adapt recumbent cycle ergometer submaximal rate . The non-exercising leg serve control exercise leg . Main study outcome : Main study outcome include upregulation gene skeletal muscle exercise ( focus gene encode myokines ) change blood plasma level select protein exercise .
DOC.brief_title: MyoGene : Effects Acute Exercise ( Myokine ) Gene Expression Human Skeletal Muscle
DOC.criteria: Age 4060 year Male gender BMI < 30 kg/m2 Exercising regularly ( > 2 time week , > 3 hour total per week ) Unstable body weight ( weight gain loss > 3 kg past three month ) Following , recently follow ( weightloss ) diet Donated intend donate blood 2 month two month study Medical condition interfere study outcome ( i.e . cardiovascular disease , pulmonary disease ) Systolic blood pressure > 160 mmHg and/or diastolic blood pressure > 100 mmHg Use medication know interfere gene expression muscle ( i.e . statin , fenofibrate ) . Use antithrombotic therapy ( marcoumar , sintromitis ) . Diagnosed diabetes mellitus type 1 2 . Drugs alcohol abuse ( > 3 glass alcoholic beverage day ) . ( Chronic ) injuries locomotor system interfere intervention Participated another study within last six month
